file_content.text: Hostile targets detected! Initiating slaughter protocols!
Whoa, hold up! This trip just got a lot more interesting.
Sir--enemy footsteps mar our path. An ambush!
That's quite far enough, Major. We have the rescue operation well in hand.
Sadly, for Havoc Squad, the challenge of the Gormak was simply too much. Your remains won't be recovered for some time. My condolences.
I'm here to rescue the Voss, not to fight you.
Yes--which is exactly why no one will know we had anything to do with your death.
There's no need to fight. We could make this a joint operation.
How kind. But there simply isn't enough glory to share in a mission like this. Some other time.
If you take us on, you'll all die.
If you try to take me down, I'll wipe your squad out.
While I respect your opinion on the matter, orders are orders. I'm sure you understand.
